questions.text: What is the name of a phase transition between a solid and a gas.
How do molecules move in a solid?

answerChoices.text: They move relative to each other but cannot easily leave each other.

questions.text: How do molecules move in a liquid?

answerChoices.text: They move relative to each other but cannot easily leave each other.

questions.text: How do molecules move in a gas?

answerChoices.text: They move relative to each other but cannot easily leave each other.

questions.text: Which state of matter will take the shape of its container but not its size?
